19.0: “When a stranger resides with you in your land, you shall not wrong him.  The stranger who resides with you shall be to you as one of the your citizens; you shall love him as yourself, for you were strangers in the land of Egypt: I the Lord am your God.”

22.19: And the priest shall raise them with the bread of the first-fruits for a wave-offering before the LORD and with two lambs they will be holy to the LORD for the priest.
